Details: “AM” by Arctic Monkeys has been on Top Albums Global the longest, at 219 weeks straight.
“HOP” by Stray Kids is the highest new entry on Top Albums Global at #35.
“The Lockdown Sessions” by Elton John is the biggest gainer on Top Albums Global, up 48 spots at #118.
Taylor Swift has the most spots on Top Albums Global. “THE TORTURED POETS DEPARTMENT: THE ANTHOLOGY” is the highest at #13.
